actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to limit the use of passenger motor vehicles and chauffeurs by Federal officers and employees.

summary.text: Motor Vehicle Use Limitation Act - Prohibits the employment of chauffeurs and the use of Government motor vehicles for transporting any Government official between the individual's dwelling and place of employment. Exempts for the provisions of this Act: (1) the Chief Justice of the United States; (2) the President and Vice President; (3) specified officers of Congress; and (4) other specified officials. States that this Act does not prohibit the operation of a bus, car pool, or van pool system established pursuant to law.

titles.title: A bill to limit the use of passenger motor vehicles and chauffeurs by Federal officers and employees.
